title: Missing ward skins?
body:
When I got into champ select yesterday, two of my ward skins (Tomb Angel and Serpent Lantern) were both missing from the selection menu. After the game, I checked the store to see if I could select them in the store, but they didn't show up there, either. I submitted a ticket yesterday, but haven't heard back yet. 

Has anyone else had this problem? If so, how did you fix it? Help would be much appreciated! Thanks!

replies.body: There's currently an issue where some ward skins are not selectable despite being unlocked on the account.  We don't have an eta for this currently.  I did look into your specific issue and can confirm that both the Tomb Angel and Lantern of the Serpent wards are indeed on the account.  Hope that helps!
Ok, great! Just glad the problem is acknowledged. Thanks a bunch!
I have the exact same problem! My lantern skin is missing and I've seen a lot of people are missing it too. Same with the gingerbread ward skin.
